sid.definition: Unique ID number of survey, given by the Hydrographic Office

surveycode.definition: Code of survey starting with HY, given by the Hydrographic Office

areaname.definition: Topographic name of area covered by survey

organisation.definition: Name of the organisation that conducted the survey

ship.definition: Name of the ship with which the survey was conducted

positionsystem.definition: Technique used to determine geographic position during survey

echosounder.definition: Name of the echo sounder equipment used during survey

seafloormapping.definition: Name of the seafloor mapping system used during survey
